lemma transfer_rec_nat[refine_transfer]: assumes FN: "\<And>s. \<alpha> (fn s) \<le> fn' s" assumes FC: "\<And>n rec rec' s. \<lbrakk> \<And>s. \<alpha> (rec s) \<le> rec' s \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> \<alpha> (fs n rec s) \<le> fs' n rec' s" shows "\<alpha> (rec_nat fn fs n s) \<le> rec_nat fn' fs' n s"
